name: Walking Home
description: Alone with no phone and crippling social anxiety, you only have one option: Walking Home. Walking Home is a stealth-based horror game that challenges the player to venture home from a night out through city streets while avoiding potentially dangerous areas, people, and other obstacles. The player must carefully manage their anxiety levels to avoid succumbing to the darkness and dying. The main goal of the game is to find a path to the safety of home.
